about.heroSubtitle: We started FreeChef with a simple belief: the best food in the world isn't in restaurants â€” it's in people's homes.
about.quote: We grew up eating our grandmothers' food and wondering why nothing in restaurants tasted quite the same. Then we realized â€” the magic was never just in the recipe. It was in the love, the stories, the kitchen where someone cooked just for you.
about.missionTitle: Making the world's best food accessible to everyone
about.missionP1: The restaurant industry is broken. Middlemen take huge cuts. Talented cooks can't afford commercial kitchens. And consumers are stuck choosing between overpriced delivery apps and fast food.
about.missionP2: FreeChef flips the script. We connect home cooks directly with food lovers in their neighborhood. No commercial kitchen required. No 30% platform fees. Just real people making real food.
about.missionP3: We imagine a world where a grandmother from Georgia can share her khinkali with someone in Brooklyn. Where a retired chef from Lyon can make coq au vin for his neighbors. Where food becomes a bridge between cultures, not a commodity.
about.value1Desc: Every culture expresses love through food. A grandmother's recipe, a father's secret sauce, a friend's birthday cake â€” food connects us in ways nothing else can.
about.value2Desc: Behind every dish is a journey â€” from Tbilisi to Tokyo, from Oaxaca to Naples. We celebrate the diversity of world cuisines and the people who keep traditions alive.
about.value3Desc: We believe in building real connections between neighbors. When you order from a FreeChef cook, you're not just buying food â€” you're supporting a person and their dream.
about.value4Desc: Home cooking means less packaging, less food waste, and shorter delivery distances. It's better for communities and better for the planet.
about.joinMovementDesc: Whether you're a food lover looking for authentic meals or a cook ready to share your talent â€” there's a place for you at FreeChef.

forCooks.heroSubtitle: Share your cooking with your community. Set your own hours, your own prices, and build a loyal following of food lovers who appreciate real food.
forCooks.everythingSucceedDesc: We handle the platform, payments, and logistics. You focus on what you do best â€” cooking amazing food.
forCooks.benefit1Desc: You decide what your food is worth. No pressure, no algorithms â€” just fair pricing for your craft.
forCooks.benefit2Desc: Choose when you're available. Cook full-time or just weekends â€” it's completely up to you.
forCooks.benefit3Desc: Create your own brand. Loyal customers keep coming back, and our platform helps you grow.
forCooks.benefit4Desc: We provide liability insurance, food safety training, and 24/7 cook support. You're never alone.
forCooks.benefit5Desc: Start from your kitchen and grow at your pace. Many of our cooks have turned their passion into full-time careers.
forCooks.benefit6Desc: Verified badges, featured placements, and a review system that rewards quality. Your talent gets the spotlight.
forCooks.step1Desc: Tell us about yourself and your cooking. Share your story, your cuisine, and what makes your food special.
forCooks.step2Desc: Complete a food safety certification and a quick kitchen review. We make this simple and free.
forCooks.step3Desc: Upload photos, set prices, and describe your dishes. We'll help you make your profile shine.
forCooks.step4Desc: Go live and start receiving orders from food lovers in your neighborhood. Welcome to FreeChef!
forCooks.readyToStartDesc: Join thousands of home cooks who are sharing their passion and earning on their own terms.
forCooks.freeJoin: Free to join. No commitments. Start when you're ready.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Text: By accessing and using FreeChef, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.
terms.section2Text: FreeChef is an online platform that connects home cooks with individuals seeking personal chef services for events, dinner parties, and other occasions. We act as an intermediary and do not directly provide cooking services.
terms.section3Text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are solely responsible for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.section4Text: Cooks listed on our platform are independent contractors, not employees of FreeChef. Cooks are responsible for food safety, proper licensing, insurance, and compliance with local health regulations in their jurisdiction.
terms.section5Text: All payments are processed through our secure payment system. FreeChef charges a service fee on each transaction. Refund policies vary depending on cancellation timing and circumstances. See our cancellation policy for details.
terms.section6Text: FreeChef is not responsible for the quality of food prepared by cooks, any allergic reactions, foodborne illnesses, or any damages arising from the use of our service. Users engage cooks at their own risk.
terms.section7Text: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting. Your continued use of FreeChef after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Text: We collect information you provide when creating an account, including your name, email address, location, and profile details. We also collect usage data such as pages visited and features used.
privacy.section2Text: We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you about bookings and updates, and personalize your experience on the platform.
privacy.section3Text: We share your information only with cooks or customers you choose to interact with, payment processors for transactions, and as required by law. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
privacy.section4Text: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacy.section5Text: We use cookies and similar technologies to maintain your session, remember your preferences, and analyze platform usage. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings.
privacy.section6Text: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also request a copy of your data or ask us to restrict its processing. Contact us at privacy@freechef.com for any requests.
privacy.section7Text: If you have questions about this privacy policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@freechef.com. We will respond to your inquiry within 30 days.
